verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, along \w with|strong="H3947"\w* some Reubenites—\w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram, \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliab, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* On \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Peleth|strong="H6431"\w*—conducted

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* rebellion \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w along|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* 250 \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w renowned|strong="H8034"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* representatives \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* told \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w too|strong="H5921"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w exalt|strong="H5375"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”
\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* followers, “\w Tomorrow|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reveal|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w person|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3045"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* chooses \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* followers \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* follows: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* fire \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* chooses \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*. \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w too|strong="H5921"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w*!”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H8085"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*!

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* separated \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w perform|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H1571"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fellow|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3878"\w*, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* followers \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* conspired \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Aaron, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w grumble|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram, \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliab, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “We \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*!

\w Is|strong="H1571"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? \w Must|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* appoint \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* ruler \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?

Moreover, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*. \w Will|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w gouge|strong="H5365"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w*? \w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H7489"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w regard|strong="H6437"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* mistreated \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, “\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* followers \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* appear \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*—\w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron.

\w Each|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—250 \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* Aaron \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* well.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* man \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron,

“Separate \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w so|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H2063"\w* \w I|strong="H8432"\w* may \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w an|strong="H3615"\w* \w instant|strong="H7281"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* Moses \w and|strong="H6440"\w* Aaron \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* said, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w*, \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*?”
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* move \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* Abiram.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Abiram, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w warned|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, “\w Move|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w*. \w Do|strong="H2403"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w swept|strong="H5595"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w moved|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram. \w Meanwhile|strong="H3318"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrances|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w tents|strong="H4908"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* wives \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w infants|strong="H2945"\w*.

Then the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said to Moses,
“Tell Eleazar son of Aaron the priest to remove the censers from the flames and to scatter the coals far away, because the censers are holy.

As for the censers of those who sinned at the cost of their own lives, hammer them into sheets to overlay the altar, for these were presented before the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, and so have become holy. They will serve as \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign to the Israelites.”
So Eleazar the priest took the bronze censers brought by those who had been burned up, and he had them hammered out to overlay the altar,

just as the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* commanded him through Moses. This was to be \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reminder to the Israelites that no outsider who is not \w a|strong="H3068"\w* descendant of Aaron should approach to offer incense before the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, lest he become like Korah and his followers.
The next day the whole congregation of Israel grumbled against Moses and Aaron, saying, “You have killed the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s people!”
But when the congregation gathered against them, Moses and Aaron turned toward the Tent of Meeting, and suddenly the cloud covered it and the glory of the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* appeared.

and the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said to Moses,
“Get away from this congregation so that I may consume them in an instant.” And Moses and Aaron fell facedown.

Moses said to Aaron, “Take your censer, place fire from the altar in it, and add incense. Go quickly to the congregation and make atonement for them, because wrath has come out from the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; the plague has begun.”
So Aaron took the censer as Moses had ordered and ran into the midst of the assembly. And seeing that the plague had begun among the people, he offered the incense and made atonement for the people.
He stood between the living and the dead, and the plague was halted.
But those who died from the plague numbered 14,700, in addition to those who had died on account of Korah.
Then Aaron returned to Moses at the entrance to the Tent of Meeting, since the plague had been halted.
